nodes.text: The Ragoon system was a star system within the Core Worlds. The Ragoon system was surrounded by several stars. This system contained the planet of Ragoon VI, which was under the jurisdiction of the Galactic Senate with the help of senator of Aaeton. The people of Ragoon transferred their power to the Senate to ensure the wonders of their world were never be destroyed. In space, the planet of Ragoon VI gave off a blue glow.
